column4: how do I see the sticky bit or whats it called when listing, it doesnt always show in the permission field (with ls -l) how do I know the exact permissions?
ls -l should show, but there's also 'stat filename'
I was trying it and setting first chmod 700 foo then cmod o+t the T is shown with ls -l, but then if I set chmod 707 the T is not visible, but the folder still has strange color when listing it
but the stat command was nice, thanks
